text: The 1981-82 Fulham RLFC season was the second in the club's history. They competed in the 1981–82 Championship in the Rugby Football League. They also competed in the 1981–82 Challenge Cup and the 1981–82 League Cup. They finished the season in 13th place and were relegated from the top tier of professional rugby league in the UK. ==Championship== Final Standings {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |-
